name: Service Blueprint Template - Studio Science
description:
A service blueprint is an excellent tool for designing a service in its entirety. Centered around the customer journey, a service blueprint defines how an organization’s capabilities (people, policies, processes, and systems) enable the customer’s experience. With this holistic perspective on the entire service, it’s easier to see where there is tension between the customer experience and the organization's capabilities.


The template is build using auto layout so each row automatically resizes to fit based on the items in each section.


Channels are represented using icons, with a legend at the bottom of the blueprint.


This template includes the typical steps in a journey, but we encourage you to duplicate it and make it your own!


Some ways to make it your own and build upon it:

  1. Customize the journey steps to those that fit your customer's specific journey—they aren't always this straightforward
  2. Add additional rows to map different aspects along the journey as appropriate for the purpose of your project (emotional high/low points, jobs to be done, opportunity areas)


Template provided by Studio Science
